title: GEN_RDT Function Block
description:
GEN_RDT generates pulses with a defned pulse width and random spaï¿¾cing. The output pulses with the pulse width TP_Q be generated at random
intervals TX. TX fuctuates randomly between time MIN_TIME_MS and
MAX_TIME_MS. The module generates output pulses at XQ only when the
ENABLE input is TRUE.
name: GEN_RDT

input.name: Enable
input.description: A boolean to enable or disable the function block operation.

input.name: Min_Time_ms
input.description: The minimum time interval (Taktzeit) for the output generation.

input.name: Max_Time_ms
input.description: The maximum time interval (Taktzeit) for the output generation.

input.name: TP_Q
input.description: The duration for which the output should remain in the TRUE state.

output.name: xQ
output.description: A boolean output that indicates the state of the output based on the timing conditions.
